title: MVG Observer: Linear Regression
text:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import sklearn
import scipy
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from sklearn import preprocessing


mvg_data_orig = pd.read_csv("https://data.mvg.auch.cool/subway_only_dedup.csv")


mvg_data = mvg_data_orig
mvg_data = mvg_data.drop(columns=['transportType', 'realtimeDepartureTime'])
mvg_data = mvg_data[mvg_data.realtime]
mvg_data['onTime'] = mvg_data['delayInMinutes'] == 0
mvg_data
